mapper.insert: insert into account (account_email, account_password, account_role, account_nickname, account_mbti) values (#{accountEmail}, #{accountPassword}, #{accountRole}, #{accountNickname}, #{accountMbti})
mapper.select: select account_id from account where account_email = #{accountEmail} and account_password = #{accountPassword}
select board_id, board_title from board where account_id = #{accountId}
